welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Spalding, a charming city known for its beautiful gardens and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring our city and all it has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marham RAF Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Marham RAF Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport is used exclusively for military personnel and operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and provides basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families, and offers specialized services and facilities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.
